clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase III Study Comparing Total and Partial Omentectomy for Patients With Advanced Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase III, Multicenter, Prospective, Randomized, Controlled Clinical Trial Comparing Total and Partial Omentectomy for Patients With Advanced Gastric Cancer (TOP-GC)

lead_sponsor.agency: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

collaborator.agency: First Affiliated Hospital of Guangxi Medical University
The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University
Xijing Hospital of Air Force Military Medical University
The First Affiliated Hospital of Kunming Medical College
The First Affiliated Hospital of Nanchang University
Cancer Institute and Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences

clinical_study.source: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase III, multicenter, prospective, randomized, controlled clinical trial to evaluate the impact of omentectomy for advanced gastric cancer on patient survival.

detailed_description.textblock: In order to evaluate the impact of omentectomy for advanced gastric cancer on patient survival, we designed this trial. Patients who received curative gastrectomy were divided into two groups based on whether they underwent omentectomy. The purpose of this study is to prove the non-inferiority of omentum preservation compared with omentectomy in patients with T3-T4a gastric cancer.

other_outcome.measure: The volume of intraoperative blood loss
other_outcome.description: The volume of intraoperative blood loss (IBL) was defined as the total from suction and the weight of gauze sponges at the conclusion of the operation. The Blood loss volume is recorded in milliliters.

Postoperative morbidity was defined as the incidence rate of the postoperative complication. The postoperative morbidity were examined within 30 days after surgery. Postoperative morbidity was graded with use of the modified Clavien-Dindo classification of surgical complications.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Experimental group/D2 radical gastrectomy with partial omentectomy
arm_group.description: Partial omentectomy with preservation of the greater omentum at >3 cm from the gastroepiploic arcade.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Control group/D2 radical gastrectomy with total omentectom

intervention.description: Experimental group D2 radical gastrectomy with partial omentectomy. Partial omentectomy with preservation of the greater omentum at >3 cm from the gastroepiploic arcade.Control group with total omentectomy.
intervention.arm_group_label: Experimental group/D2 radical gastrectomy with partial omentectomy

facility.name: Department of Gastrointestinal Medical Oncology, Tianjin Medical University Cancer Hospital
